titles.title: Workforce-Ready Educate America Act of 2012
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to allow employers a credit against income tax as an incentive to partner with educational institutions to provide skills training for students.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 3/22/2012--Introduced. Workforce-Ready Educate America Act of 2012 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow a $1,000-per-student tax credit to employers who partner with educational institutions to provide skills training. Limits the amount of such credit to $3,000 in a taxable year.
